item.title: Alicia Silverstone’s ‘Irish Blood,’ Acorn TV’s Top Show Ever, Renewed for Season 2
item.description: The season one finale debuts tonight.

item.title: Alicia Silverstone Mystery Drama ‘Irish Blood’ Renewed For Season 2 at Acorn TV
item.description: Acorn TV has announced the Season 2 renewal of “Irish Blood” starring Alicia Silverstone and Jason O’Mara. Season 2 will consist of six hour-long episodes and will begin production in early 2026

item.title: Alicia Silverstone Mystery Drama ‘Irish Blood’ Renewed For Season 2 at Acorn TV
item.description: Acorn TV has announced the Season 2 renewal of “Irish Blood” starring Alicia Silverstone and Jason O’Mara. Season 2 will consist of six hour-long episodes and will begin production in early 2026
